Articles.Content:
Centipede 1 is a new multi-purpose ship that can:

a) Transport passengers 

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) Take off vertically and land horizontally (no take off again though)

c) Travel and land to the mun

d) Leave the solar system

Planned versions are:

-Long range (with ion engines and 'sucker' engines for unlimited power)

-VTOL (thrusters on underside for multiple takeoffs and landings

Send me a PM if you want the actual spacecraft file!

Feel free to reply with modifications, it has much room for improvement!
